artist: Delineator: Giorgio Vasari; Draftsman: Ignazio Enrico Hugford; Engraver: Cosimo Colombini
description: half length portrait of a man with a long beard; wearing cloak; holding pencil in right hand; left profile
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: ROSSO PITTOR FIORENTINO / G. Vasari T II. H. del   CColombini fe / 173  | on sheet in pencil above title: 811
portfolio: From Serie degli uomini i piu illustre nella pittura, scultura e architettura, plate 173
title: Rosso Pittor Fiorentino
